name: GenerateYAMLTask
description: Generate YAML documentation for the Azure DevOps Extension
author: Richard Fennell

inputs.name: inDir
inputs.label: Source Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory that contains the 'vss-extensionjson' for the extension

inputs.name: outDir
inputs.label: Output Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder to write the documentation to.

inputs.name: filePrefix
inputs.label: File Prefix

inputs.name: copyReadme
inputs.label: Copy Readme.md
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true also copies the extension readme.md as <extension ID>.md
